title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the detailed requirements for the RFCDependencyTracker system, including the types of RFCs to be tracked, the desired dependency tracking functionality, and any other relevant features or constraints.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall architecture of the RFCDependencyTracker system, including the components, data models, and interfaces required to support the specified requirements.

title: Define Data Models
description: Design and document the data models required to represent RFCs, dependencies, and any other relevant entities in the system.

title: Implement Backend Services
description: Develop the backend services and APIs required to manage RFCs, track dependencies, and provide the necessary functionality for the RFCDependencyTracker system.

title: Develop User Interface
description: Design and implement the user interface for the RFCDependencyTracker system, allowing users to create, view, and manage RFCs and dependencies.
